title: Startup | Senior role | Help need to validate the offer
content:
Years of Experience: Around 5 years
Prior Experience: Startup
Current Salary (Cash): 18.7LPA (18 base + 0.7L variable )

Date of the Offer: July, 2024
Company: Startup 
Title/Level: Senior Engineer
Location: Fully remote
Salary Base: 30 LPA
Signing Bonus: 0
Perf bonus: 10%
ESOPs: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 33 LPA

Am I low balled or I should be happy with the hike ? The biggest regret is that I haven't had counter offer and haven't negotiated since they have given what I asked .
